pullrequest.title: Possibility to enforce contact addition in ContactManager even if there are no subscribers

content.raw:
Yes that's because I started the build on ``pr_any`` and this still has problems with the status update. Steve just explained that to me. You have to go to console output and click on the links. The builds aren't really failing. Here's for example the build for Xenial:

[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/164/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/164/)
content.html:
Yes that's because I started the build on pr_any and this still has problems with the status update. Steve just explained that to me. You have to go to console output and click on the links. The builds aren't really failing. Here's for example the build for Xenial:
